product_name: REI  Halo +40 Sleeping Bag - Women's Long - Special Buy
long_description: The REI Halo +40 women's long warm-weather sleeping bag offers a perfect of balance low weight, high-quality materials and top performance--great for all your backpacking and car-camping trips.
